title: How to allow a specific app notification to override do not disturb
content:
With Do Not Disturb enabled and blocking notification sounds, is there a way to allow an individual app permission to make a notification sound?

When I go to bed, I want to silence most sounds and notifications.
However, when my Ivideon app (a security camera) senses movement and sends a notification, I want that notification sound to be heard.

Thanks for any help you can provide.
